attributes.action: Hold politicians to account for knowingly lying to or misleading the public
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.theguardian.com/politics/2016/jun/25/leave-campaign-rows-back-key-pledges-immigration-nhs-spending

In other professions people would be dismissed from their jobs and removed from professional bodies for similar practice.

We should be able to trust our elected officials and if we can't, then they should be removed from their position of power.
attributes.background: It has come to light following the recent EU referendum that the leaders of the Brexit campaign knowingly lied on matters that influenced the final outcome of the vote - particularly immigration & the redistribution of funding to the NHS. They should be held to account for this.
